full_text: ie a Te 2019/KER/378 IN THE HIGH COURT OF KERALA AT ERNAKULAM PRESENT THE HONOURABLE MR. JUSTICE B.SUDHEENDRA KUMAR FRIDAY,THE OATH DAY OF JANUARY 2019 / 14TH POUSHA, 1940 Cr1.MC.No. 8717 of 2018 CRIME NO. 401/2018 OF Adhur Police Station , Kasargod PETITIONER/S: 1 E.HASSAINAR AGED 56 YEARS, S/O. YOUSEF, MANJAMPARA, ADHUR VILLAGE, ADHUR POST, KASARAGOD DISTRICT, 671543. 2 IRFAD, AGED 23 YEARS S/O. SMT.K.PUSHPAVATHT RESPONDENT/S: 1 KUNHAPU, AGED 47 YEARS S/O. KEPU, MANHAMPARA HOUSE, ADHUR POST, KASARGOD - 671543. 2 STATE OF KERALA, REP. BY THE PUBLIC PROSECUTOR, HIGH COURT OF KERALA, ERNAKULAM - 682031. BY ADV. SRI.SEBASTIAN JOSEPH (KURISUMMOOTTIL) OTHER PRESENT: SMT .V.SREEJA,PUBLIC PROSECUTOR THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON 04.01.2019, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING: Crl.MC.No. 8717 of 2018 -2- ORDER The petitioners are accused in Crime No. 401 of 2018 of Adhur Police Station registered for the offences punishable under Sections 143, 147, 148, 323, 324 and 506 read with Section 149 IPC and Section 3 (1)(s) of Scheduled Castes and Scheduled Tribes (Prevention of Atrocities) Amendment Act, 2015. 2. The first respondent is the de facto complainant, who filed affidavit stating that the matter has been settled and hence he has no further grievance against the petitioners. The learned Public Prosecutor, on instructions, has also submitted that the matter has been settled by the parties. The offences alleged are personal in nature. Therefore, settlement of the above dispute will lead to peace and harmony in the locality. In the said circumstances, J am inclined to quash Annexure-Al FIR and further proceedings against the petitioners in Crime Dee) os ca] oh Pe 2019/KER/378 Cr1l.MC.No. 8717 of 2018 -3- No. 401 of 2018 of Adhur Police Station in exercise of the inherent power under Section 482 Cr.P.C., to meet the ends of justice. It is ordered accordingly. In the result, this Crl.M.C. stands allowed. Dated this the 4" day of January, 2019. Sd/-B. SUDHEENDRA KUMAR, JUDGE. /true copy/ P.S. to Judge ani/ ie a Te 2019/KER/378 Cr1.MC.No. 8717 of 2018 -4- ie a Te 2019/KER/378 Cr1.MC.No. 8717 of 2018 -5- APPENDIX PETITIONER'S/S EXHIBITS: EXHIBIT Pl A TRUE COPY OF THE FIR DATED 07.10.2018 SUBMITTED BY THE ADHUR POLICE BEFORE THE DISTRICT AND SESSIONS JUDGE, KASARAGOD. EXHIBIT P2 THE AFFIDAVIT SOLEMNLY AFFIRMED BY THE 1ST RESPONDENT DATED 17.12.2018.
